divs: Sighting Detailsi was in south shererville at 9:15pm when i saw what looked like a star but something about it was different so i drove a few block while i was watching it then i noticed it was moveing, the color was a pumkin orange , it was noiseless i stopped on a side street and shut off my car and you could hear a pin drop yet no noice from this orange ball, it has no blinking light s i know it wasnt any type of aircraft ive ever seen. the object went from the east to the west and it went till i couldent seeit anymore due to tall trees.. the objet didnt stop that i seen.it went in a straight line no turning just east to west... pretty wierd..
